è¿›è¡Œä¿®æ”¹src/main.rsï¼Œä½¿å…¶åŒ…å«Rocket Hello, world!ç¨‹åºçš„ä»£ç ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

#![feature(proc_macro_hygiene, decl_macro)]

#[macro_use] extern crate rocket;

#[get("/")]
fn index() -> &'static str {
    "Hello, world!"
}

fn main() {
    rocket::ignite().mount("/", routes![index]).launch();
}
